item.title: Report X-2025020623
item.description:
Report X-2025020623

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-15T03:17:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-01
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DESIGNATED RESPONDER ARRIVED TO THE EAST SORT ACROSS DOOR 23 WITH P.P.E ON AND THEN FOLLOWED THE DECISION TREE AND THE APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET. PACKAGE WAS BOUGHT BACK TO PSC AND THEN EXAMINE INSIDE THAT THE PRODUCT BOX HAD AN 'UN3091' MARKING. RESPONDER NOTIFIED THE RMP.

item.title: Report X-2025020619
item.description:
Report X-2025020619

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-15T03:17:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-27
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WENT TO A CALL IN NORTH OUTSIDE INDUCT IN SMALLS. THEY CONTAINERIZED THE LEAKER AND BROUGHT BACK TO PSC FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. UPON INSPECTION, IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT THE PRODUCT WAS NAIL POLISH. NO EXTERNAL MARKING ON PACKAGE OR SHIPPING LABEL WERE FOUND TO INDICATE PACKAGE CONTAINED HAZARDOUS PRODUCTS.
